tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Appointment page by clicking on the Appointments tab.
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the Appointment page by clicking on the Appointments tab.

tests.title: At "Appointments" page each label and field should have proper label and validations
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases At "Appointments" page each label and field should have proper label and validations

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "unverified payments list" page by clicking on the "Unverified Payments" button
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "unverified payments list" page by clicking on the "Unverified Payments" button

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular Appointment
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Appointment details" page by clicking on eye icon against that particular Appointment

tests.title: As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Bill me later requests list" page by clicking on the "Bill me later requests" button
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user should be navigated to the "Bill me later requests list" page by clicking on the "Bill me later requests" button

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the Appointments based on the status of the Appointment like requested,accepted etc. by clicking on the filter button
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can filter the Appointments based on the status of the Appointment like requested,accepted etc. by clicking on the filter button

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the appointment between particular dates by clicking on the calendar icon
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can filter the appointment between particular dates by clicking on the calendar icon

tests.title: As a Admin the user can also filter the appointments based on the payment mode like cash,pos or bill me later etc.
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can also filter the appointments based on the payment mode like cash,pos or bill me later etc.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can filter the appointments in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Requested for" field of the table.
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can filter the appointments in Ascending or descending of appointment requested date by clicking on the filter on "Requested for" field of the table.

tests.title: As a Admin the user can search any appointment with appointment id or patient name or provider name with the help of search bar
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can search any appointment with appointment id or patient name or provider name with the help of search bar

tests.title: As a Admin the user can switch between pages using next and previous buttons.
tests.fullTitle: Appointments Module Test cases As a Admin the user can switch between pages using next and previous buttons.
